message: Hi Bob, I'm Alice. I'm offering you a great product for a starting price of $20,000. I believe this product will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents the value I see in this product, I'm willing to negotiate.  How about we meet halfway at $17,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $17,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $16,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
